name: Village Defender (itch) (BibbiCodex)
description:
Village Defender is the first game in my game dev gauntlet series where I make six games in six months.  The goal for making this first game was to actually finish making a game. 

As for the game itself, you can experience the entire game in a few minutes. There are no levels or anything that extends replayability. I hope you find the gameplay fun but challenging.
